Title: On .NET Live - Source Generators in Jinget
Author: dotnet
Description:
.NET Source Generators are a powerful feature introduced in .NET 5 that enable compile-time code generation, allowing developers to automate repetitive tasks, optimize performance, and reduce boilerplate code. The framework Jinget leverages Source Generators to simplify complex scenarios, enhance productivity, and maintain clean, efficient codebases. During this talk, our guest, Vahid Farahmandian, shares how they‚Äôve integrated Source Generators into Jinget, the challenges they faced, and the best practices they‚Äôve adopted to make the most of this transformative technology.
